main event: A witness in Buffalo, New York observed an unidentified object resembling a star with a long vapor trail on January 4, 1966.
interesting points: The object changed appearance from a star to a silver ball.,The sighting occurred at 5:30 PM under clear conditions.,The object emitted no noise and left a vapor trail that quickly vanished.,The witness had difficulty estimating the size and distance of the object.,There was a follow-up request for more information from the U.S. Air Force.
sighted object: an object resembling a star with a long vapor trail
witness description: A local resident reported the sighting to police officers.
